root: ^You receive a message requisition your presence in the Medbay. You arrive to find Ripley sitting next to a crew member in a bed. She looks towards you, “Ah, I'm glad you could make it. This man would like to make a request of you. I'm quite torn myself, so I was hoping you would be able to settle this matter.” You listen as the man explains his request. He has lived all his life with a disease that causes him great agony but is treatable to an extent. He has undergone the treatment an immeasurable amount of times and has grown tired of this cycle. All he asks is that he be allowed to let the disease run its course and claim his life. He promises that he will donate his personal wealth to the ship should you agree. Ripley seems to be having a hard time with this conundrum. She understands where the man is coming from, but still feels compelled to try and save him. She looks at you with exhausted eyes. It's time to make a choice.

Approve: ^The man smiles, thanking both you and Ripley, who doesn't even try to hide the fact that she is incredibly uncomfortable with the outcome. The man passed away a short while later, and true to his word, he left all his money for the ship. You catch a glimpse into the Medbay and see Ripley zip up the deceased man in a body bag. She lets out a shaky sigh and stares off into the distance. It takes her a moment before she notices you. She closes the door.
Insist: ^You tell Ripley to administer the treatment. The man is visibly upset, but before he can make a fuss Ripley injects something into his IV drip and he falls unconscious rather quickly. She looks at you, and you see a slight twitch around the corners of her mouth. Did she just smile? Ripley tells you that the treatment will take a short while, but he will be better soon. She thanks you for your help with the situation and shoos you out of the Medbay, closing the doors behind you.
